001package com.technototes.library.logger;
002
003import com.qualcomm.robotcore.eventloop.opmode.OpMode;
004import com.technototes.library.hardware.HardwareDevice;
005import com.technototes.library.logger.entry.BooleanEntry;
006import com.technototes.library.logger.entry.Entry;
007import com.technototes.library.logger.entry.NumberEntry;
008import com.technototes.library.logger.entry.StringEntry;
009import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
010import java.lang.reflect.Field;
011import java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException;
012import java.lang.reflect.Method;
013import java.util.ArrayList;
014import java.util.Arrays;
015import java.util.LinkedHashSet;
016import java.util.List;
017import java.util.Set;
018import java.util.TreeSet;
019import java.util.function.BooleanSupplier;
020import java.util.function.DoubleSupplier;
021import java.util.function.IntSupplier;
022import java.util.function.Supplier;
023import org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcore.external.Telemetry;
024
025/**
026 * The class to manage logging
027 *
028 * @author Alex Stedman
029 */
030public class Logger {
031
032    private static Set<String> hardwareToLog = new TreeSet<>();
033
034    public static void LogHardware(String names) {
035        if (names == null || names.length() == 0) {
036            hardwareToLog = new TreeSet<>();
037        } else {
038            hardwareToLog = new TreeSet<String>(Arrays.asList(names.split(";")));
039        }
040    }
041
042    public Entry<?>[] runEntries;
043    public Entry<?>[] initEntries;
044    private final Set<Entry<?>> unindexedRunEntries;
045    private final Set<Entry<?>> unindexedInitEntries;
046    private final Set<Object> recordedAlready;
047    private final Telemetry telemetry;
048    private final OpMode opMode;
049    /**
050     * The divider between the tag and the entry for telemetry (default ':')
051     */
052    public char captionDivider = ':';
053
054    /**
055     * Instantiate the logger
056     *
057     * @param op The OpMode class
058     */
059    public Logger(OpMode op) {
060        opMode = op;
061        telemetry = op.telemetry;
062        telemetry.setDisplayFormat(Telemetry.DisplayFormat.HTML);
063        unindexedRunEntries = new LinkedHashSet<>();
064        unindexedInitEntries = new LinkedHashSet<>();
065        recordedAlready = new LinkedHashSet<>();
066        configure(op);
067        runEntries = generate(unindexedRunEntries);
068        initEntries = generate(unindexedInitEntries);
069    }
070
071    private void configure(Object root) {
072        for (Field field : root.getClass().getFields()) {
073            try {
074                Object o = field.get(root);
075                if (!recordedAlready.contains(o) && isFieldAllowed(field)) {
076                    if (o instanceof Loggable) {
077                        configure(o);
078                        recordedAlready.add(o);
079                    } else if (
080                        field.isAnnotationPresent(Log.class) ||
081                        field.isAnnotationPresent(Log.Number.class) ||
082                        field.isAnnotationPresent(Log.Boolean.class)
083                    ) {
084                        if (field.getType().isPrimitive() || o instanceof String) {
085                            set(field.getDeclaredAnnotations(), field, root);
086                            System.out.println("prim");
087                        } else if (getCustom(o) != null) {
088                            set(field.getDeclaredAnnotations(), getCustom(o));
089                            System.out.println("cust");
090                        }
091                    }
092                }
093            } catch (IllegalAccessException ignored) {
094                System.out.println("reeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee");
095            }
096        }
097        for (Method m : root.getClass().getMethods()) {
098            set(m.getDeclaredAnnotations(), m, root);
099        }
100    }
101
102    // TODO make list and do sort with comparators
103    // I wish this had a comment describing what Alex thinks it's doing,
104    // I *think* it's trying to set the 'indexed' entries to their preferred locations
105    // then filling in the gaps with unindexed  or lower priority entries.
106    // That bottom loop is also quite slow, but we're talking about 0-20 entries, so performance
107    // is probably irrelevant...
108    private Entry<?>[] generate(Set<Entry<?>> a) {
109        Entry<?>[] returnEntry = new Entry[a.size()];
110        List<Entry<?>> unindexed = new ArrayList<>();
111        for (Entry<?> e : a) {
112            int index = e.getIndex();
113            if (index >= 0 && index < returnEntry.length) {
114                Entry<?> other = returnEntry[index];
115                if (other == null) {
116                    returnEntry[index] = e;
117                } else {
118                    if (e.getPriority() > other.getPriority()) {
119                        unindexed.add(other);
120                        returnEntry[index] = e;
121                    } else {
122                        unindexed.add(e);
123                    }
124                }
125            } else {
126                unindexed.add(e);
127            }
128        }
129        for (int i = 0; unindexed.size() > 0; i++) {
130            if (returnEntry[i] == null) {
131                returnEntry[i] = unindexed.remove(0);
132            }
133        }
134        return returnEntry;
135    }
136
137    private void update(Entry<?>[] choice) {
138        if (!hardwareToLog.isEmpty()) {
139            for (HardwareDevice<?> hw : HardwareDevice.devices) {
140                if (hardwareToLog.contains(hw.getName())) {
141                    // Add the line to the log
142                    telemetry.addLine(hw.LogLine());
143                }
144            }
145        }
146
147        try {
148            for (Entry<?> item : choice) {
149                // telemetry.addLine(
150                //   (i > 9 ? i + "| " : i + " | ") +
151                //   (choice[i] == null ? "" : choice[i].getTag().replace('`', captionDivider) + choice[i].toString())
152                // );
153                // All teh fancy HTML stuff gets in the way of the FTC Dashboard graph
154                telemetry.addData(item.getName(), item.get());
155            }
156            telemetry.update();
157        } catch (Exception ignored) {}
158    }
159
160    /**
161     * Update the logged run items in temeletry
162     */
163    public void runUpdate() {
164        update(runEntries);
165    }
166
167    /**
168     * Update the logged init items in temeletry
169     */
170    public void initUpdate() {
171        update(initEntries);
172    }
173
174    private void set(Annotation[] a, Method m, Object root) {
175        set(
176            a,
177            () -> {
178                try {
179                    return m.invoke(root);
180                } catch (IllegalAccessException | InvocationTargetException e) {
181                    e.printStackTrace();
182                }
183                return null;
184            }
185        );
186    }
187
188    private void set(Annotation[] a, Field m, Object root) {
189        set(
190            a,
191            () -> {
192                try {
193                    return m.get(root);
194                } catch (IllegalAccessException e) {
195                    e.printStackTrace();
196                }
197                return null;
198            }
199        );
200    }
201
202    @SuppressWarnings({ "unchecked" })
203    private void set(Annotation[] a, Supplier<?> m) {
204        boolean init = false, run = true;
205        Entry<?> e = null;
206        for (Annotation as : a) {
207            if (as instanceof Log.Number) {
208                e = new NumberEntry(((Log.Number) as).name(), (Supplier<Number>) m, ((Log.Number) as).index());
209                e.setPriority(((Log.Number) as).priority());
210            } else if (as instanceof Log) {
211                e = new StringEntry(((Log) as).name(), (Supplier<String>) m, ((Log) as).index(), ((Log) as).format());
212                e.setPriority(((Log) as).priority());
213            } else if (as instanceof Log.Boolean) {
214                e =
215                    new BooleanEntry(
216                        ((Log.Boolean) as).name(),
217                        (Supplier<Boolean>) m,
218                        ((Log.Boolean) as).index(),
219                        ((Log.Boolean) as).trueValue(),
220                        ((Log.Boolean) as).falseValue()
221                    );
222                e.setPriority(((Log.Boolean) as).priority());
223            } else if (as instanceof LogConfig.Run) {
224                init = ((LogConfig.Run) as).duringInit();
225                run = ((LogConfig.Run) as).duringRun();
226            }
227        }
228        if (e != null) {
229            if (init) {
230                unindexedInitEntries.add(e);
231            }
232            if (run) {
233                unindexedRunEntries.add(e);
234            }
235        }
236    }
237
238    /**
239     * Repeat a String
240     *
241     * @param s   The String to repeat
242     * @param num The amount of times to repeat the String
243     * @return The String s repeated num times
244     */
245    public static String repeat(String s, int num) {
246        if (num > 100) {
247            System.err.println("One of the entries is too long, make sure your scaling is correct");
248            num = 100;
249        }
250        return num > 0 ? repeat(s, num - 1) + s : "";
251    }
252
253    private static Supplier<?> getCustom(Object o) {
254        if (o instanceof Supplier) {
255            return (Supplier<?>) o;
256        } else if (o instanceof BooleanSupplier) {
257            return ((BooleanSupplier) o)::getAsBoolean;
258        } else if (o instanceof IntSupplier) {
259            return ((IntSupplier) o)::getAsInt;
260        } else if (o instanceof DoubleSupplier) {
261            return ((DoubleSupplier) o)::getAsDouble;
262        } else if (o instanceof Integer) {
263            return () -> (Integer) o;
264        } else if (o instanceof Double) {
265            return () -> (Double) o;
266        } else if (o instanceof Boolean) {
267            return () -> (Boolean) o;
268        } else {
269            return null;
270        }
271    }
272
273    private boolean isFieldAllowed(Field f) {
274        if (f.isAnnotationPresent(LogConfig.AllowList.class)) {
275            if (!Arrays.asList(f.getAnnotation(LogConfig.AllowList.class).value()).contains(opMode.getClass())) {
276                return false;
277            }
278        }
279        if (f.isAnnotationPresent(LogConfig.DenyList.class)) {
280            if (Arrays.asList(f.getAnnotation(LogConfig.DenyList.class).value()).contains(opMode.getClass())) {
281                return false;
282            }
283        }
284        return !f.isAnnotationPresent(LogConfig.Disabled.class);
285    }
286}
